hymn.title: This is My Son, the Beloved

layout.singingstanza: This is My Son, the Be -- lov -- ed, In Whom I have found my de -- light. This is My Son, the Be -- lov -- ed, In Whom I have found my de -- light. Hear Him, hear Him! My Son, in Whom I've found My de -- light. Hear Him, hear Him! My Son, in Whom I've found my de -- light.

lyrics.stanza: This is My Son, the Beloved, In Whom I have found my delight. This is My Son, the Beloved, In Whom I have found my delight. Hear Him, hear Him! My Son, in Whom I've found My delight. Hear Him, hear Him! My Son, in Whom I've found my delight.
